library(haven)
library(tidyverse)

```{r}
head(icu_2)
```
```{r}
summary(icu_2)
```

```{r}
icu <- icu_2 |> mutate(race = factor(race), loc = factor(loc))
```

```{r}
model <- glm(status ~ age, data = icu, family = "binomial")
summary(model)
exp(cbind(OR = coef(model), confint(model)))
```

